page.title: 01GENERAL INTRODUCTION
page.content: Our block consists of the town of Huntly. The population is 4300. The rural area to the south of Huntly includes the valley of the river Bogie which flows north to meet the river Deveron at Huntly. The town is by-passed to prevent congestion in our narrow streets. The area has farming industry and commercial interests. Many topics have been studied; shops, fashion, food, churches, hospital, Scotts hospital, railway station, transport, farming and the mart. A day in the life of a farmer and a day in the life of a pupil are studied.
